11.title: Penny McBelcher

111.content:
Penny is at a hotel, she calls room service and asks to bring her everything. She literally stuffing herself with every kind of dish imaginable, hoping that the empty feeling will go away, because of her fear of becoming overweight, she's not planning on digesting any of this food. After that, she burps loudly, "Whew! Pardon me! That feels so much better!" she said, then she starts swelling up. She ran her hand accross her bloating belly. "...uh-oh..." she said.

Her stomach was expanding, "I think I went a little bit overboard on all that food...plus, I feel another big one coming up..." she exclaimed. She feels my stomach, and boy is it expanding! Juices felt sloshing all over her body. "Ugh...my aching stomach...I better sit down and rest for a bit..." said Penny. She sat and moan from on top of my large stomach. "That's better...oh man, that food's really taking a toll on my stomach..." Her stomach feels plump. She looked like she's pregnant. "ugh...my poor tummy...this belly-ache is getting a lot worse..." Her stomach begins to swell up more, and it gets worse. "uuuuugggghhh...ohhh, my stomach feels a lot worse...and now I...I..." Penny's stomach bloat and gurgle, and let's out a big burp, "BBUUUUURRRRRPP!!!!" Penny starts to feel better now, her stomach is so big. "Excuse me!" said Penny. But then releases a fart, "Eh heh heh...sorry..." Even though she's a bit of a lightweight, she's been holding that one in for a while now, must've been all those burgers she ate. "BUURRRPP!!!!! Excuse me. Well...it was a lot better than some of the sushi i've had. Besides, a girl's gotta eat." said Penny.
111.title: She goes on an eating binge.

113.content:
Penny was walking outside with her large belly the size of a small beachball, when she saw her cousin, Baylie MacArthur. She sees Baylie MacArthur and her girlfriends from Crystal Prep Academy washing her car and listening to music on her phone. After she walked away from Baylie's house, she has an strange feeling, her stomach gurgled loudly. "Oh my..." said Penny nervously. She felt so embarrassed and she blushed, she walked back to her house. In her house, Penny ate everything that her cousin gave her at her bake sale, by literally stuffing herself with every kind of dish imaginable, she hopes that the empty feeling will go away. Then she walked upstairs.

In her room, she looked in the mirror and she felt a little bit overboard on all that food she ate. "Uh-oh...what's happening to me?" she said. Penny stopped as she felt a familiar feeling. Her belly gurgled loudly. She could feel a burp coming on, and a big fart. "Ugh...my poor belly...this belly-ache is getting a lot worse." Penny said Penny starts bloating, on the verge of farting. "*breathing heavily* Ohhh, my stomach feels a lot worse...and now I...I..." She felt that she was pregnant and about to have a baby. "There's a baby in there, and it wants to be born." When she tries soothing herself, Penny apologizes to herself for lying, and then releases a burp and a fart. "BUURRRPP!!!!!!" But that's just the beginning, She started bloating again, and worse, she unleashed a wet, bassy fart that stunk up the entire room. Penny thinks that her farting is over, till it keeps on going.

Penny felt better after that explosion, but then, she has diarrhea and rushes off for the bathroom. When she went to the bathroom, she unleashed it. Her bathroom is now polluted. "Excuse me! That was huge problem." said Penny. Penny learned that, she thought she could live forever, she wound up living for it, for the rest of her life. "That's better...oh man, that really taking a toll on my stomach." said Penny.
113.title: Penny's Stomach Problems

Belle is one of the sweetest girls you'll ever meet; just don't get in the wway of her and a chocolate malt!

Now that we're done with that what story are we going to do.
12.title: Belle Godiva

121.content:
"Belle are you really sure about this. If you don't really want to you can still..."

"Mom stop it. We went over this about a hundred times. I'm fine. Besides I need to do it anyway sooner or later. It could take years before I can find something as good if this. Besides you don't live that far away. A half hour drive. perhaps forty minutes. If I have problems I'll call you."

"She will be fine honey. Come on she's twenty. She's old enough for it." Her father said.

"I know I'm just worried. It's a big step for her."

Belle looked outside. Today was the day. Finally she was out of house. Time to life on rooms. She loved her parents but she was twenty. It was time to leave the nest. She was also glad she was on her own now. Now she could make her own decisions and do a bit what she wanted. Of course she could't really ignore her parents. If they thought she was horrible at cleaning she would clean her house better or more often or at least clean when they would come.
She admit it had come a bit sudden. Sure her mom told her more then a year ago about going on rooms. But finding something was hard but her mother told she would look and a few weeks ago she suddenly said she found something. To be honest Belle even forget they had that talk until her mother told the news. She needed to make a fast decision but finally said yes. She was glad she did. She had her own bathroom and kitchen. She heard many times you had to share that with about four or more other people. Not she. She had her own room all for her.

"Belle honey please promise me you eat healthy." Her father said.

Belle squinted with her eyes. Her father was never fine with her weight. Fine she knew she was overweight but she did't saw any problem with that. She even liked it and was proud at how fat she was. Besides she would't call herself obese. She did't even reached the two hundred pounds. However she was planning to reach it and go way further then that. But her father never liked that. Her mother did't really minded that.

"It's about my weight again is't it. You know it's also mom's fault. She cooks way too good. That's one of the reasons why you married her right."

"That's not the reason but I must admit I loved her cooking also. But I was't talking about her. But you are already overweight. I just hope you eat healthy so you don't gain any more weight. You don't want to become any fatter do you?"

Belle sighed. She never told her father she liked it or wanted to get fatter since she knew he could't deal with it. Her weight was't only thanks to her mothers cooking even while she often took a second and some times even a third course it was also part for her chocolate addiction. She could't remember when she tasted her first bite of chocolate but she knew that after her first bite she was sold. She loved chocolate. She could eat huge amounts of it. Chocolate was never safe in their house. While Belle was't a mean girl but she just could't help herself around chocolate. Her biggest weakness. The sweet brown goodness. Food for the gods. At least she thought of it that way. It did't matter to her if it was pure, milk, white, filled or with nuts she loved it all and ate it all. Her favorite food was chocolate fondue but the only ate it at her birthday. Her parents did't really saw it like dinner but for Belle's birthday they did wanna make a exception.

"Is Tiffany all right with me leaving?" Belle asked.

Tiffany was Belle's little sister and she looked up to her big, sweet sister. Belle was her roll model so it was no wonder her sister was also very chubby with a big belly.

"Well she was a bit upset but when I told her she could have your room she calmed down. But I'm sure she will miss you."

Belle could''t wait. All her stuff was already there. But yesterday her parents decide to have a nice supper to celebrate she went living on her own and after that she decide to sleep one last night in her parents house.

"All right we're here." Her father said.

"Well then I guess this is goodbye." Belle said. "I visit you guys in the weekend."

"If you want to come home just call. All right honey!"

"I will mom. Don't worry."

She walked inside and fast ran upstairs to the second floor where her room was and walked into her own room. A kitchen open to a living room with a small table with some chairs, A couch with a corner in it and a T.V. A Bookcase and in the other room her bed and clothing closet.
She first went to the fridge which she in the secret stuffed with chocolate and took a box of Godiva chocolates.

"Time to relax with Mister T.V and a old friend chocolate."

She also wondered who lived further in the house. She knew there were at least four other people who lived here but she decided to meet them later.
121.title: Belle's own room

1211.content:
Belle was about to relax when she heard a knock on the door.

"Hmm? Who could that be?"

Belle walked to the door and opened it, revealing...
1211.title: Someone knocks on the door

12111.content:
Belle put the chocolate back in the fridge. She was't herself around chocolate. She opened the door and blinked a few times.
Before her were standing four obese girls. The first one was tanned. A color like coffee with milk, Her hair was dark brown. She smiled and pushed her big belly that was clearly poked out from under her shirt, out a bit to show of her belly button ring. She seemed to be around the same weight as Belle. Maybe a few pounds more.
After her was standing another girl. She was kind of pale and looked even paler thanks to her black hair, Barrett, skirt and shirt that also did't cover her belly. She seemed to be even fatter then the tanned girl and smiled on a shy way. She had a French look but that could also be because of her Barrett.
Then she saw a redhead. She had dark red hair and was kind of pale. Her face, arms, legs and her big belly that was also clearly visible were covered with freckles. Belle thought she must be around 300 pounds. She blinked and smiled happy.
There was another girl standing behind the other three. But you could't miss her. She had a black skin and hair and wore it in a ponytail. But she was way fatter then the others. Belle knew for sure she was over 350 pounds. Her shirt just covered her boobs but was hardly big enough to cover her belly. But she looked and carried her weight very confident.
Belle must admit she was a bit jealous. She always liked being fat and wanted to get fatter. All these girls were so much fatter and looked so good. Looking at how good those girls looked made her desire to gain weight even bigger.

"Hi!" The tanned girl said. "We wanted to meet you. My name is Regina. That lovely French girl is Monique. The redhead is Penny and that black girl there is Ginger."

"Eh... hi. My name is Belle." Belle said and looked at them like a hypnotized bunny. "Belle Godiva."

"Godiva?" Regina asked. "Is't that that woman that drove naked on a horse through the city?"

"Eh... I... I always thought it was... the name... of... a chocolate."

"Yeah that's also true. But according to the story, lady Godiva was married to a mean count who asked way too much money from his people. She wanted him to stop doing that. He said he would only do that if she would ride naked through the city on a horse. She did it and the count kept his word."

"Maybe it was your ancestor." Penny said.

"So my ancestor... was riding naked on a horse... through the city?" Belle asked.

Belle had eaten more then enough Godiva chocolates to remember the drawing. Before she never put to much attention to the drawing and more attention to eating the chocolate. But now she thought about it it really did look a lot like a naked woman on a horse.

"Well if it was your ancestor, she was good woman who did it to help people. So that's not so bad." Regina said. "But enough about naked people. Do you invite us in or do we need to keep talking here?"

"Eh of course. Come in." Belle said and did a step aside so the four girl could come inside.

The four girls walked inside and went sitting on the couch. Belle boiled some water for tea and put a bowl with cookies on table.

"Nice that you came to live here. This apartment was empty for way too long." Penny said.

"Well we had that tanned girl." Ginger said.

"Come on. That girl was so sensitive. First she wanted to go home, then stay and then go home again."Regina said. "Well she did't fit in here. But you fit in a lot better. You have also a big belly."

"Well I like being fat and i want to get fatter." Belle said and slapped her hands for her mouth.

Belle wondered how she could have been so stupid. She barely knew this girls an she told them her deepest secret. She looked at them and turned pale. She wondered how they would react.

"Good to hear that. You're part of the group!" Ginger said.

"What? Which group?" Belle asked.

"Well you like being fat and want to get fatter."Penny said. "Well me too. I also like being fat and want to become fatter.

"Just like me." Regina said.

"Me too." Ginger said.

"And ere too." Monique said.

Belle noticed Monique did't speak out the H. Probably because she was French and French did't use the H.

"Really? Wow... well that's a... a surprise. But I'm so glad I met some girls who think like me." Belle said.

"I'm happy you came to live here Belle." Penny said. "We were afraid we would get a toothpick girl here that eats nothing then salad."

"Penny, I and Ginger know each other since kindergarten." Regina said. "We met Monique during high school. When we were looking for rooms we thought about how nice it would be if we could live in the same neighborhood."

"Our parents know how good friends we were." Penny continued. "And with some help, and a lot of luck we were able to all four live here. But we were with four. Now with you the group is complete!"

Belle looked at the other four girls. She just moved over here and it seemed she now already found four good friends..
12111.title: Welcome to the group

151.title: Regina Barriga

choices: No I don't have any plans
1511.content:
Slowly the sun was rising. It was a beautiful sight. Too bad most people were still asleep not seeing this beautiful sight. Most were still deep in bed since it was the first day of vacation. Young kids got all ready out bed and were in their pajama's watching morning cartoons. Slowly everyone woke up.
Also Regina. Well she woke up and turned around trying to fall asleep again what did't really worked. She just kept her eyes closed and staid in bed. She knew she could be pretty lazy sometimes. Especially in the morning she was't very active. She rolled a bit around in bed hoping she could fall asleep again. But after she woke up it was hard to fall asleep again. Finally she opened her eyes and yawned. She put her hands under her head and looked at the sealing.
She did't really wanted to get out of bed. But there was one thing that would force her down. Her hunger. She softly stroke her big gut. It was pretty big. She planned to make it bigger. She liked being fat. She was not alone. her best friends also liked it. All of them were pretty fat and all of them liked it.
Slowly she threw her blanket of. Since it was pretty hot past night she slept naked. She saw herself in the mirror from her clothing closet. She was happy it was pretty big or else she probably would't be able to see her entire body. She looked at her body and most say she thought she looked pretty good. She was tanned, like a coffee with milk color with dark brown hair. Chubby arms, big thighs, but the biggest was her huge round belly. She smiled admiring her puffy, bowl cheeks. She also adored her belly button. She had a huge collection of them and liked it to show that.
She fast picked a dark red short sleeved shirt. It was warm enough for it, and some gray shorts. She noticed her bra was getting tight. She wondered if her bra shrunk, she gained fat on her back or her breasts got bigger. She knew what she wanted it to be.
She tied her shoes and ran downstairs. Her mother and siblings were already in the kitchen. Regina must admit she was pretty happy with her family. Her mother was also pretty fat. She looked smiling at her mother's big pregnant belly. Yeah her mother was pregnant from her fourth child. She was fat but lately she watched her diet a bit so her baby would be healthy. She lost some weight but Regina knew that after her sister was born her mother would soon get the weight back on. Her mother hated to diet. She rather experiment with food and enjoy a good meal. She also was a great cook. She only did this for the best of her child. Well it was just until her sister was born and it would be so far after about a month or so. Then she would have another little sister. Well she did't knew for sure it was a sister. But as far if she knew only girls were born in her family. Her mother also had two sisters and her grandmother also had four sisters. She was convinced that this would also be a girl.

"Morning Regina." Her mother said cheerful. "How are you honey."

"I'm fine mom. Thanks for asking. But I'm pretty hungry."

"Well then how about I make a big omelet for you with five eggs with sea food in it. Also some bacon and six toasts with chocolate spread. and five croissants with butter, some sausages and a piece of leftover pie?"

"Well I would like that but make it seven eggs and eight toasts also eight croissants and some extra sausages. I'm a growing girl after all."

"Whatever you want honey. Go sit at the table while I start."

Regina's sibling were already at the table. Both girls and both also pretty fat. One was12 and her other 8. Both were just as tanned as her but her and the same colored hair. But her oldest sister (Terri) wore it lose, and it was way longer then hers. Almost till her hips and her youngest sister (Skipper) wore it in two pigtails. Both were busy eating. Most girls in their family were fat. She liked that both her sisters were fat and her mother liked it too.
With being 21 it was a big difference of age with her sisters. her mother was pretty young when she got her. She was't planning at getting pregnant at that age but she got pregnant and decided to keep it. But she waited some time before she got her other kids. Regina need to wait 9 years for that. She spend her first nine years of her life without a sibling. She was happy she found some friends in the meantime. Else she would have been really lonely.
She went sitting on a chair. She noticed her but was hanging over the edge of the chair but did't cared.

"How is it with the baby?" She asked.

"Oh you mean my champion kickboxing?"

"Be happy! Then you and dad don't have to work anymore."

"And what do you want to do today? Do you have any plans."
1511.title: Regina wake up

15113.content:
"No I don't have any plans" she said as she finished her breakfast "I was thinking I'd just hang out at the mall"

She got up and headed toward the door "Try not to stay out too late" said her mother

Regina nodded and headed out the door. The she headed to the bus stop and got onto the bus.Her stomach gurgled a bit, she wasn't gassy yet as the food hadn't completely worked its way through her. She sighed sadly, she loved to fart for a quick laugh. And with the number of people on the bus, it would be hilarious to see them reeling and recoiling whenever she'd blow booty.

"Oh well" she thought "Maybe I can do it in the malls food court"

Little did she know, that fate had another plan for her, a plan involving a boy.

As the bus stopped, another person got on. As he made his way through the aisle, he tripped and fell over, making Regina laugh. She leaned over and held out her hand

"Let me help you up" she said

"Thanks" he said

She pulled him up and made eye contact with him. Her face grew warm, she started to blush when she saw....
15113.title: No I don't have any plans

choices: She isn't able to say something
151132.content:
...a pretty handsome, gentlemanly boy.
Regina didn't know what to say which was really unlike her. Normally, she knew exactly what to say, but she didn't hold back and said exactly what she thought, even if it was sometimes a bit mean towards somebody. She has a big (sometimes too big) mouth, but at least she was honest to others. But now she still looked at the boy like a hypnotized bunny. She got a feeling, like two pieces clicked together. She still held the hand of the boy.
"Thank you, but I would like to have my hand back."
It took sometime before Regina's brain understood what he asked. Then, she quickly let go of his hand.
"Can I sit here?" He asked polite pointing against the seat across her.
Regina got herself under enough control to nod slowly and looked at the boy. She’d never seen any boy like him. In 21 years she had met enough boys. In elementary school, she hung out with a lot of boys, since boys liked it that a girl could fart so loudly then. However, they were just friends. At high school, she also talked with some boys. Of course, she also sometimes saw a boy she thought looked handsome, but it was nothing compared to what she felt now. She never really had a relationship and wasn't really sure what to do. Normally, she knew exactly what to say and now at an important moment she couldn't say a word.
"Do I have something on my shirt?" He asked friendly.
"Eh... no." Regina managed to say.
"Then why are looking at me?" He asked still friendly like he was just curious.
"Eh, I haven't seen you before. Are you new here?" She asked and wanted to hit herself afterward. What a stupid question. Hundreds of people used the bus every day. She didn't know all those people. To be honest, she hardly knew any people on the bus. Perhaps that old lady that lived at the end of the street and a girl from school.
"I am new here. I just moved. My name is Marcus Smith. May I know your name?"
"Eh... of course. My name... Eh what's my name again." She hoped he didn't think she was a idiot that didn't know her own name.
"My name is eh... Barriga. Regina Barriga." She managed to say and smiled.
"What a nice name." He said politely. "It suits you. Do you also have a nickname?"
Regina looked a bit nervous at the boy. He seemed really nice and friendly. She did have a nickname but she wasn't sure if she wanted to tell him that. Normally, she used that nickname around her friends, but she didn’t want to start this introduction with a lie.
"Yeah, I have one. My friends call me ‘hot and spicy gut’, since I like hot and spicy food. I love food."
"I can see that. Happy too. I hate girls who diet. Say Regina... I planned to look around in the mall, but I've never been to the mall here, so do you mind going with me? Perhaps you can show me around."

Regina suddenly felt like she was on fire. She wanted this so badly. She just hoped she would be able to answer.
151132.title: Marcus

choices: Told him she was fine, ignoring her stomach for now
Politely excused herself to the ladies room to fart openly
1511321.content:
"I would love too!" she said. "And what luck, I think we're here."
The bus stopped and the people began filing out. Regina led Marcus by his hand.
"Now, don't be shy." she said.
She brought him into the building, pointing out the stores. The mall seemed to have everything, video arcades, movie theaters, skating rinks, clothing stores, and more food courts than they could count. Soon, they stopped at the middle of the mall, at the fountain.
"This place is huge" Marcus said.
"You could get lost pretty easily" Regina said "The fountain is in the exact center of the mall, so it's a good place."
Marcus turned to look at the fountain. He fished a penny out of his pocket and tossed it in.
"Making a wish?" Regina asked.
Marcus smiled and nodded. "What did you wish for?"
"Oh...nothing" he said.
Regina nudged him. "Come on." She said. "Tell me."
"I just..."Marcus began "Wished for a good time."
"Oh you'll have a good time" Regina said "We haven't even seen half of the mall yet, plus we haven't gone in any of the stores yet. There's still so much to...."
Regina stopped as she felt a familiar feeling. A heat came over her stomach, her belly gurgled like a water cooler. She could feel a fart coming on, and a big one at that.
“Oh great" she thought "Why now?"
At any other time she'd have blown her booty as loudly as she could, the louder the better. But she had a boy with her right now. She liked him and couldn't risk letting him in on her gassy little quirk so soon.....could she?
"Are you OK?" Marcus asked "You look a bit anxious."
Regina turned to him and....
1511321.title: I would love too!

choices: Do you want to meet my friends?
Do you want to come over to my house?
15113211.content:
"I'm fine, really. Nothing’s wrong." Regina said, holding her fart in.
"So, this is the center of the mall?” Marcus asked.
"Yeah, that's how I find my way around here. When I was here for the first two times on my own I also got lost, but I found my way back thanks to that fountain. I also got lost once when I was five, but that's a different story."
"So what's your favorite store?" He asked.
Regina needed to think a bit about this. Most girls of her age would say: Clothing store. But she wasn't very fond of the clothing stores here. They didn't have many clothes in her size and the ones they had were so terrible she would rather go naked. If she wanted nice clothes she needed to go to a big size store and that was a lot further. She also liked the music store. She loved rock bands, especially ones made by cool girls. She also went to the toy store sometimes for a present for her sisters. But lately they’ve started to lose their interest in toys. She thought about all of the other stores for a second and finally mumbled: "I guess the food court. I always get something to eat when I'm here."
"Well then, how about showing me some more stores here."
Regina didn't know if it was because of the wish that Marcus made, but both had a good time. Regina showed him all stores. Some they went in and some they walked by. Marcus was kind and calm but then Regina felt another thing in her belly. It rumbled loudly.
"So it sounds like you're hungry. Am I allowed to take you to one of the fast food courts to buy you a lunch?"
"Well that's really nice, but I normally eat a lot. Are you sure you want to pay for it."
"Don't worry. My family and I are... kind of rich. I'm sure I can afford it."
"Well then if you say so."
The nearest fast food court was McDonalds.
"So what would you like?" Marcus asked.
"Well I’ll take... six big mac menus, two with a strawberry milkshake, two with a vanilla shake and two with a chocolate shake and... what the heck. I’ll also have three dozen of chicken mc nuggets."
Marcus gave their order and even while the man looked a bit disturbed at their order he handed it to them and Marcus paid without complaining. But when Regina sat down, she again felt a heat come over her belly. Before she could stand up, she let out a loud fart. So loud that even people outside the McDonalds could hear it. Regina blushed and looked at Marcus.
"Wow, that was a big one. That's kind of cool."
"Eh, really? You don't mind me farting like that?"
"No, not at all. I kind of like it."
Regina sighed, relieved and smiled at Marcus.
"Look who we have here. I should have known it when I heard such a fart!" A mean voice said.
"Hello, Daisy." Regina said, bored.
Daisy and Regina knew each other since they were toddlers and never got along, and while they grew older that only got worse. With Regina's increasing weight (and that of her friends) while Daisy was slender, she always teased them for it.
"See you're getting even fatter." Then she saw Marcus. "And who is this?"
"I'm Marcus. I just moved over here."
"Really? Well how about I show you around. Introduce you to all the cool people."
"I already am showing him around." Regina said angry.
"Who would want to go with a farting lard ball like you when they can have such a beauty like me? Just look at you. How can you stand that gut? So what do you say? Let’s lose the fat ass and come with me."
"What? No way. I like her." Marcus said. "You call yourself a beauty. Come on, you look like a skeleton with fuzzy hair. How could I be attracted to that? Oh and I like the real stuff, not silicone tits."
Daisy's mouth fell open. She wasn't used to rejections. Boys didn't reject her, she rejected boys. At high school, she was known like the school slut and had done it with almost any boy. At least the ones that were cool in her eyes. But now the coolest boy she’d ever seen rejected her, called her ugly, and liked a fatso like Regina. She stormed out, angry and humiliated.
"You really meant that?" Regina asked.
"I did. Do you remember? I said I hate girls who diet. Well, I forgot to tell you that I like fat girls, and I like it to see fat girls gain.”
15113211.title: In the mall

choices: To a McDonalds outside of the mall.
To another restaurant inside of the mall.
151132111.content:
"Do you want to meet my friends?" Regina asked.

"Sure. Do you want to call them up?" Marcus asked.

"Yeah. I'll do that." Regina answered.

Regina proceeded to call her friends and tell them to come to the mall to meet Marcus.

"So, are they coming?"

"Yeah. They'll be here in 8 minutes." Regina said.

"Great. That should be just enough time to finish your food." Marcus said.

Regina looked at her meal and laughed.

"Believe me, Marcus, I’ve put away twice as much food in half the time.” She boasted.

“I’d like to see you prove it.”

“You’re on.” Regina agreed.

7.5 minutes later

Regina rubbed her engorged stomach as it began the process of digesting her fast food feast. Marcus just stared at her with a slacked jaw. The girl noticed this and smirked.

“I take it you don’t see this every day.” Regina said smugly.

“No, but it was interesting to see.” Marcus said.

“I aim to please.” Regina said.

“Well, you’re pretty accurate.”

Regina’s cheeks turned a shade of red not dissimilar to that of her shirt. Then, she felt another grumble from within her belly. It was loud enough to be heard by everyone in the restaurant.

“Are you still hungry?” Marcus asked.

“No. I’ve got to fart.” Regina corrected.

“Then, do it. I already said that I don’t mind.” Marcus said.

“But this one feels bigger than the last one. You might not be able to handle it.”

“I think I’ll be fine.” Marcus assured her.

After a few seconds, Regina decided to just let it out.

~*FFFFFFFAAAAAARRRRRTTTTTTT!*~

Regina’s butt blast vibrated her seat as well as Marcus’s, and it was noxious enough to drive out the other diners and even the workers. After 10 seconds, it ceased and Regina sighed in relief.

“Ahh. That felt fantastic. How did you like that, Marcus?” Regina asked.

“That was great.”

Regina looked out one of the windows and saw her friends walking into the restaurant.

“Hey, girls.” Regina called out.

“Hi, Regina.” They greeted.

“This is my new friend, Marcus. Marcus, these are my best friends: Penny McBelcher, Belle Godiva, Monique LeBouffe, Ginger Gluttonson, and Bella Button.” Regina introduced.

Marcus and the girls exchanged greetings and handshakes.

“Well, now that the pleasantries out of the way, anyone hungry?” Marcus asked.

Penny, Belle, Monique, Ginger, Bella, and Regina raised their hands.

“Alright, but we should go somewhere else. The workers are all gone.” Marcus said.

“What would make them leave?” Ginger asked.

“I farted for 10 seconds and that cleared out the restaurant, except for Marcus.”

“So, Regina just ripped one for 10 seconds and you didn’t mind. I’m impressed.” Penny said.

“Yeah, we had to build up a tolerance to it first.” Bella added.

“I guess it just doesn’t affect me.” Marcus said.

“Where should we go, then?” Monique asked.

They decided to go…
151132111.title: Do you want to meet my friends?

choices: Their order arrives and they stuff their faces.
Marcus tells the girls a bit more about himself.
1511321112.content:
"Well I guess since we're in the mall... why not stay here and go to another restaurant?" Belle asked.

"Yeah that seems like a good idea." Ginger said.

Marcus must admit he was a bit sidetracked. Around him were six fat girls, a few of them were even morbidly obese. He was in heaven. He must admit that he liked Regina the most but he also wanted to know the others.
He was happy his family was so rich. His teenage sister spends about $1000 a week on clothes. His parents thought that it was only fair that he got the same amount of money as his sister, but he didn’t use all of his. Sure, sometimes a CD or DVD. Sometimes some new clothes or shoes, but he saved most of it.

"Come on, Marcus! Let's go!" Penny said.

"So you are best friends?" Marcus asked while they walked through the mall.

"Well, I’ve known Penny and Ginger since kindergarten." Regina said. "Monique... we met her about 2 years ago or something during high school... but she fit right in our group. Belle came a few months before Bella and as for Bella... we’ve known her for about... what is it? Two months I believe."

"Something like that. It’s hard to say, since some months have thirty day and others have thirty-one days. February even has twenty-eight days." Bella said.

"Ha, you think?" Penny said laughing.

"You need to get used to Bella." Regina said. "Because she also has a problem with gas (giggle).”

"Well, what do you think of Burger king?" Ginger asked.

All others agreed and they all walked in.

"So what do you all want?" Marcus asked.

"What? Wait for a second? You're not planning to pay for all of us... are you?" Belle asked.

"Well, I thought so. I wanted to meet you so Regina invited you."

"We can't do that. Does he know how much we can eat?" Penny asked.

"He knows." Regina said rubbing her hands over her gut.

"Don't worry. I can afford it." Marcus said, thinking about all of the thousands of dollars he saved up.

"Are you sure? I mean we eat... well a lot." Ginger said.

"Girls, can I take your orders?" Marcus asked.

All six girls were surprised, but said what they wanted. No matter what or how much they asked he stayed calm. He wrote up the entire order on a piece of paper, and went in line. In the meantime, the girls found a place to sit.

"Wow, where did you find him Regina? He's perfect." Belle said.

"Totally. He’s my dream boy." Penny said.

"Hey, hands off. He's mine." Regina said. "Only I can say that about him. But you're right, he's perfect."

"You know what's so funny..." Penny said. "It looked like he liked us. Especially you Regina, but it seemed like he also enjoyed our company."

"Yeah. Ie also wasn't so negative about ow much we eat. Ie even paid for all of our food." Monique said still not able to say the letter H thanks to her French background.

"He doesn't like girls who diet." Regina said with a smile "He likes girls with some meat on their bones."

"Well we have more than enough of that." Bella said.

"I really like him." Regina said.

Suddenly Marcus walked back to their table.

"They're busy with the food, so it's going to take some time to make it all, but since they can't make it all at once, they will bring out the first part of the order in a few minutes and the second part of the order later."

"Yeah we’ve heard that more often than not." Ginger said.

"So Marcus, you have no problem with farts." Penny said. "But how is that with belching?"

"To be honest... I find them very amusing, especially the big loud ones."

Regina smiled. Penny perhaps was the belching queen, but she was the belching princess, and she was proud of that.

"Then you should hear Penny. She can burp the entire alphabet." Belle said.

"That's impressive." Marcus said and smiled.
1511321112.title: He's perfect

choices: The order arrives and the Gluttoons pig out.
15113211122.content:
(A/N: I’ve decided to place this story in July 2008 so that none of the chapters that split off before this one are too inconsistent. Also, I’ve given a name to the town that the girls live in and it’s a reference to their creator, Manta-Wolfe.)

“So, Marcus, while the food’s getting made, can you tell us about yourself?” Regina asked.

“Sure. My full name is Marcus Smith and I’m 20 years old. I live in a mansion on the north side of Mantaville with my parents, Frank and Angela, and my younger sister, Rebecca.” Marcus explained.

“Wait a minute. You live in a mansion? If you’re that loaded, then why would you hang out in the suburbs?” Penny asked.

“I just felt like seeing something normal for a change. I’m pretty casual about being rich. Now, can you tell me about yourselves?”

“Allow me to introduce us. We’re the Gluttoon Girls, a group of overweight cheerleaders who love eating. All of us except for Bella live in the same apartment.” Penny said.

“ I’m Ginger Gluttonson, the leader. I’m 21 years old, 360 lbs, and African-American. I come from Houston, Texas, and am called "Little Miss Prime Rib", because my favorite foods are ham and steak.” Ginger started.

“I’m Penny McBelcher, the “second in command”. I’m 21 years old, 300 lbs, and Irish-American. I was born in Dublin, Ireland and am called the "Irish Porker".” Penny said.

“I’m Monique Le Bouffe. I’m 21 years old, 245 lbs, and French. I’m called the “Blimpette” and am a flirtatious gourmet. My body odor wards off cute boys, so I’ve gotten a part-time job at a perfume store in the mall, but the perfumes that I use make me smell even worse.”

“You smell fine to me.” Marcus complimented.

Monique blushed and looked away, smiling.

“Anyway, I’m Belle Godiva. I’m 20 years old, 190 lbs, and German-American. I’m from Hersey, Pennsylvania and am dubbed the "Sweet Chocoholic" because I love chocolate. I also have a chubby little sister named Tiffany who looks up to me.” Belle explained.

“She must have a good role model.” Marcus said.

“Hee, hee, hee, you’re sweet, Marcus. You’re almost as sweet as chocolate.”

“You know who I am, Marcus. I’m 21 years old, 196 lbs, and Latin-American. I am from San Diego, California, a lover of sea food, and moved back in with my parents. I have two younger sisters, Terri, 12 and Skipper, 8, with one on the way.” Regina stated.

“I take it that they’re both bloated bundles of joy.” Marcus commented.

“Ha! They’re both pretty annoying, but they’re also very nice.” Regina said.

“Finally, I’m Bella Button. I’m 19 years old, and British-American. I was born in Great Britain, am called "Skunk-Butt" by the others, and originally 325 lbs, but after joining the Gluttoons, I ballooned up to 360 lbs. My favorite foods are burgers and burritos, my hobbies are playing video games and cooking, and I too have a job in the mall, but at an ice cream parlor.”

“Is there anyone else in your group?” Marcus asked.

“Yes there is.” A voice answered.

Everyone turned to the entrance and saw a dark-skinned woman with brown hair.

“Samantha!” Bella exclaimed.

“Sorry I’m late, gang. I got stuck in traffic.”

She took a seat and looked at Marcus.

“I see Regina was right about you being attractive.” Samantha remarked.

“Hello, I’m Marcus Smith.” He said extending a hand to which Samantha shook.

“Hi, I’m Samantha Bellen, and I’ve heard about you through my dad. Therefore, it’s only fair that I tell you a few things about me. I’m 20 years old, 260 lbs. and have an ex-boyfriend who gave the nickname, "Belly Buster", which the others now use. My favorite food is beef fried rice and my dad owns a chocolate factory, so I don’t have to work.” Samantha said.

“Well now that we know more about each other, let’s eat.”

“Great idea, Belle. I just hope that there’s enough for everyone.” Samantha said.
15113211122.title: Marcus tells the girls a bit more about himself.

choices: After the eating their bellies are bloated.
151132111221.content:
The first part of their order arrived. Immediately, seven pairs of chubby hand grabbed the food. Marcus must admit that he was a bit surprised.

"Wow. I could lose a hand in there." He thought.

The girls were too busy pigging out to notice. They were all busy stuffing food in their hungry mouths. He enjoyed seeing them enjoy their food. Their pink cheeks were chewing non-stop. They all wanted to have food, but at the same time they were friends of each other. However, every one of them was fat and wanted to get fatter.
Especially Belle, who was fat but between the others, she was a light weight. With all her 190 pounds, she still weighed less than all the others, but she would do her best to change that.
Ginger was also busy eating since she wanted to stay the leader. With her 360 pounds, she was the fattest of the group, but Bella also reached 360 pounds, so Ginger wanted to make sure she was the fattest, no matter if she liked Bella or not.
Bella knew that she was, with her 360 pounds, the fattest together with Ginger, but she didn't really mind it so much. Sure, she did want to gain, but she wasn't really bothered that Ginger had the same weight. She didn't care if Ginger weighed less or more or the same like her. Too bad Ginger didn’t know that.
All girls were having some food in each of their chubby hands.

"This is so good!" Penny said with full mouth.

"Thank you so much for paying for us." Regina said between two bites and kissed him on his cheek.

"Ooh. It looks like someone is in love." Bella said teasing.

"So what if I am?" Regina asked snappish. "He's perfect. I don't think I can ever get a better boyfriend then him!"

Bella hoped that Regina wasn't too mad. She didn't want to hurt her friend’s feelings. She was just teasing a bit.
Regina decided not to go any further. She was way too happy. She never had a boyfriend. She really liked him. She wanted a boyfriend for a long time, but most boys weren't attracted to a fat, farting girl. She hated it that she was the girl without a boyfriend. She was old enough to have a boyfriend and she was also old enough to have sex. She heard so many times other girls and boys brag about with who, or many they had done it, and about losing their virginity or doing fun stuff at parties. But now finally she could perhaps get some experience in love.

Marcus thought it was wiser not to get some food himself. He wasn't that hungry anyway. Besides he enjoyed seeing those girls eat themselves fatter. He did have some girlfriends in the past in his old neighborhood but not one girl that wanted to gain, at least not on purpose. Sure there were enough girls who were fat, but one wanted to lose weight and did it. Others wanted to lose weight but never succeeded in it. Some were ashamed about it or used it like some kind of power of corruption, a bit like a wrecking ball, unable to stop. Other girls were blind to their weight gain. Some knew it and accepted it, but weren't happy about it. However, not one was what he wanted. What he wanted was a girl that wanted to get fatter, a girl that wanted to gain, a girl that liked stepping on the scale. Not to see how much she lost, but how much she gained. A girl that didn't eat to live but lived to eat. It seemed like he moved to the right place.

'You really don't mind paying for all of us do you?" Belle asked.

"No, of course not. I just hope it's enough. I wouldn't want you to be hungry." Marcus said.

"Well you made the order before our belly buster came in, so I think..." Penny started but was cut off by a kick from Regina.

Regina looked angry at Penny. Marcus had been nice enough to pay for all their food and now she tried to let him order even more. But Marcus understood Penny.

"She's right. That was stupid of me. What do you want... Samantha... right?"

"Right." Samantha said with a smile while she gave Marcus her order. Marcus walked away for the new order while a new plate of food was set on their table. But when Marcus got back the entire plate was empty.

"They will bring it soon." Marcus said with a smile.

"This is going to cost him a lot." Belle whispered to Regina.

"I know. I feel a bit guilty." Regina said.

"Well, he didn't complain. He also said he lived in a mansion, so his parents are probably kind of... well... rich, so he can get enough money."

"Thanks, Belle. That does make me feel better."

After those words, both girls continued to pig out.

1511321112211.content:
After a few minutes, Samantha’s order arrived and the girls all snatched something. Belle got the Angus Steakhouse Burger, a burger with a large, square shaped Angus beef patty and BK Burger Shots, burgers with an eight shaped patty that were served on a pair of co-joined buns and designed to be torn into two smaller sandwiches. Samantha swiped the twelve-piece BK Chicken Fries, breaded and fried chicken strips, and the Chick'n Crisp sandwich, a small fried chicken sandwich that consisted of a chicken patty, lettuce and mayonnaise served on a sesame seed bun. Monique took two BK Stackers. One was a hamburger, consisting of two 2 oz grilled beef patties, sesame seed bun, King Sauce, iceberg lettuce, onions, pickles and cheese and another was a cheeseburger with four 1.7 oz grilled beef patties, cheese, bacon, and Stacker sauce served on a sesame seed bun. Penny grabbed the BK Big Fish sandwich and eight piece BK Chicken Nuggets, small, thin pieces of formed, white meat chicken, breaded and lightly spiced. Bella put her hand on the Rodeo Cheeseburger, consisting of a burger patty, cheese, three onion rings, and barbecue sauce served on a sesame-seed bun and the BK Broiler, a burger served on a Whopper bun with mayonnaise, lettuce and tomato. Ginger nabbed the Original Chicken Sandwich, which consists of a breaded, deep-fried white-meat chicken patty with mayonnaise and lettuce on a sesame seed sub-style bun, the Philly chicken sandwich, which had cheese, peppers and onions, and the Angry Chicken Sandwich, which was served with pepper jack cheese, bacon, "Angry" sauce, jalapeño slices, mayonnaise, lettuce and tomato. Regina got the iconic Whopper, a burger consisting of three flame grilled quarter-pound beef patties, sesame seed bun, mayonnaise, lettuce, tomato, pickles, ketchup, sliced onion, cheese, bacon, mustard, guacamole, jalapeño peppers, BBQ sauce and salsa, and the Chicken Whopper, a sandwich that featured a whole 4.7 oz (130 g) chicken breast filet, mayonnaise, lettuce, and tomato on a sesame seed roll.

Penny bit into her fish sandwich first, emitting a pleasured moan afterward. Monique’s mouth bulged with King Sauce and Stacker sauce as she stuffed as much of both sandwiches inside of it as possible. Ginger’s eyes wet slightly when she ingested part of her pepper filled Philly chicken sandwich. Belle was busy scarfing down one of her burger shots, not even bothering to rip it apart first. Samantha stuck half of the chicken fries and strips into her mouth, coating her fingers in saliva in the process. Regina swallowed some of her whopper, feeling the salsa and guacamole greet her awaiting taste buds. Bella’s mouth wet as she savored the onion rings on her Rodeo Cheeseburger. Marcus felt like he was in heaven, watching the girls engage in the most unapologetic display of gluttony that he had ever seen. It was official, moving to this town was the best thing that could have happened to him. For the next few minutes, the girls continued to plow through their meals, getting crumbs and sauce all over their clothes while doing so. Penny paused in the middle of her food binge to slurp down about half of her large Pepsi. Feeling her belly swell as the reactions between the carbonated beverage and her fish sandwich within built up bubbles of gas, Penny smiled and forced them through her throat and out of her mouth.

~*BBBBUUUURRRRRRRPPPPPPPP!*~

For four long seconds, Penny’s enormous eructation flew across the air, creating an atmosphere of pure stink around the group. Its volume drowned out the conversations of any costumers who hadn’t already abandoned the restaurant following the girls’ feast and the smell actually killed a few flies that roamed the Burger King garbage cans. After it ceased, Penny fanned the air around her, sporting a satisfied smile.

“Whew, excuse me!” Penny said.

The girls barely paid the belch any attention, having become accustomed to Penny’s famed gas blasts. Marcus on the other hand, stared in awe. Sure, he’d heard Regina break wind, twice, but Penny’s belch was just on a whole other level. Penny smirked at the sight of this.

“Now you know why I asked you about your opinion on burping, Marcus.” She stated sultry.

Regina also noticed his bewildered expression, but also something else. Gazing lower, she spotted a tight bulge in his pants and her pupils dilated.

“Marcus! Do you have an erection?!” She asked, though had a good idea of the answer.

This snapped him out of his stare and he looked at his pants, now understanding the question. Apparently, he was more interested in the burp than he thought. Marcus blushed wildly as he tried to give a response to his girlfriend while frequently tripping over his words.

“I-I’m sorry, Regina. I guess I just didn’t know how… much I liked burps is all.”

The Latina’s eyes widened after hearing this.

“So, you really do have a burp fetish.” She said.

Marcus just nodded. Regina had to think about this. He did say that he enjoyed loud belches so she should have considered something like this happening. On the other hand, she didn’t want him to possibly go for Penny because of her ‘talent’. This gave Regina an idea. She grabbed her large soda cup full of coke, took of the lid, and chugged it down until not even ice remained. Then she shook her gut violently, hoping to speed up the process of forming gas bubbles inside, and let them rush out of her body.

~*BBBBBEELLLLLLLCCHHHH!*~

Regina’s lips flapped like bacon strips as she emitted an astounding three-second behemoth that was nearly as loud as Penny’s. It began as a low growl, then quickly ascended to a fierce roar. As it was going on, its stench was fogging up the already repulsive-smelling air around them, being superior to the stink of Penny’s burp. It even caused some of the diners still in the restaurant to faint. After Regina’s beastly belch had concluded, she was met with shocked looks from everyone at the table. A few moments of silence passed before someone spoke.

“Regina, are you challenging me to a belching contest?” Penny asked.

Regina’s eyes narrowed and she grew a smirk on her face.

“Yeah, if my Marcus loves burps so much, than I should show him a good time by beating you.”

Penny understood the reason for her actions and smirked too.

“Fine, I accept it and I’ll enjoy putting you in your place.” She said.

The other Gluttoons gasped. Someone challenging Penny to a burping contest was like a wolf challenging the alpha male to a fight for leadership. The two felt the table to get more food and drink and when it arrived, they demolished it. Marcus leaned in toward the others.

“So, they’ve done this before?” He asked.

“Yes, and the last time they did, it went on for an hour.” Monique explained.

Marcus’ eyes widened after hearing that. Regardless of who wins, this would be interesting.

151132111221112.content:
~*UUURRRRPPP!*~

Penny’s burp was rather anti-climactic. It was impressive by normal standards, lasting about three seconds, but it wasn’t enough to snag victory from her Latina opponent.

“Was that it?” Sam questioned.

“Yeah. Guess I just ran out of gas.” Penny lied.

Belle narrowed her eyes slightly in suspicion. Since when did Pen run out of gas?

“So that means… I won?” Regina concluded.

It was a rare sight indeed. The second banana of belchers in the Gluttoons had actually dethroned the Queen of Burps herself (as far as she knew). That feeling was something that she got used to very quickly.
